channel.title: Mushroom on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in Mushroom on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Gills Mushroom Tart
item.description:
River Cottage head chef Gill Meller’s mushrooms, pastry and pancetta, taken from the Hugh’s Three Good Things on More4. Hugh’s recognised a simple pattern that underpins so many well-loved dishes – that they are little more or less than three good things on a plate and in this series, he pursues that idea, experimenting with different flavours and textures.

Prep time

10 - 15 mins

item.title: Chicken with Green Peppercorns and Oyster Mushrooms
item.description:
(serves 2-3)

Ingredients

  • 4 chicken breasts
  • 5g/1oz butter
  • 1tbsp/15ml olive oil
  • salt and crushed black pepper

Sauce:

  • Ѕmall white onion, peeled and chopped
  • 1 clove of garlic, peeled and chopped
  • 100ml white wine
  • 4tbsp green peppercorns, crushed
  • small bunch parsley, finely chopped
  • 125ml double cream
  • olive oil
  • salt and pepper

Garnish:
